entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 02:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening except rain along parts of the coast this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm except rainfall amount 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
